subject: Automobile Racing
Engines
Energy Efficiency
Fuel Efficiency
lead_paragraph: A major overhaul of technical regulations in 2014 will radically alter Formula One cars. At the center is a new generation of engines more in tune with our energy-conscious times and road cars.
snippet: A major overhaul of technical regulations in 2014 will radically alter Formula One cars. At the center is a new generation of engines more in tune with our energy-conscious times and road cars.
